kit.leader_skill: "Movie Heroes" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%; or Super TEQ Type Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Soaring Dragon Havoc (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Greatly lowers DEF

ultra_super_attack.name: Brilliant Strike (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Raises ATK; Greatly raises DEF; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Massively lowers DEF

passive_skill.name: Beyond the Galaxy
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained; (Forever) Launches an additional Super Attack; (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit 20% up; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ excluded) to TEQ Ki Spheres; For 4 turns from the character's entry turn: Damage reduction rate 30% up; Guards all attacks; For every Ki Sphere obtained: ATK & DEF 10% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: ATK 100% up; ATK 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up when HP is 58% or less; ATK 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle; DEF 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up when there is another "Movie Heroes" Category ally on the team, or when there is another "Hybrid Saiyans" Category ally attacking in the same turn; DEF 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up when there is an ally whose name includes "Goku" (Youth, Captain Ginyu, Jr., etc. excluded) on the team, or when there is another "Youth" Category ally attacking in the same turn

lines.text: ATK & DEF 200% up
Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
Launches an additional Super Attack
Chance of performing a critical hit 20% up
Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ excluded) to TEQ Ki Spheres
Damage reduction rate 30% up
lines.context: For 4 turns from the character's entry turn

lines.text: Guards all attacks
lines.context: For 4 turns from the character's entry turn

lines.text: ATK & DEF 10% up
lines.context: For every Ki Sphere obtained

lines.text: ATK & DEF 100% up
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK 100% up
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up when HP is 58% or less
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: DEF 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up when there is another "Movie Heroes" Category ally on the team, or when there is another "Hybrid Saiyans" Category ally attacking in the same turn
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: DEF 159% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up when there is an ally whose name includes "Goku" (Youth, Captain Ginyu, Jr., etc. excluded) on the team, or when there is another "Youth" Category ally attacking in the same turn
lines.context: When attacking with 18 or more Ki

active_skill.name: Promise Made to Dad
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 58% or less with a "Movie Heroes" Category ally whose name includes "Goku" (Youth excluded) on the team starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only)
